entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-12-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Implement Read short, int, long and their unsigned versions to stream #110944
  • where `DISABLE_ASSERT_MESSAGES` defined #110941
  • [WASM] MarshalingPInvokeScanner fails when using a nested value type contained in a different assembly. #110938
  • Test failure: tracing/eventpipe/processenvironment/processenvironment/processenvironment.cmd #110933

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Supporting collection expression `[]` for empty `ReadOnlyCollection<T>.Empty` #110942
  • `JsonSerializerContext` in System.Text.Json doesn't support the same inheritor class name in different namespaces #110931
  • how set trace level in wasmbrowser #110928

PullRequests

Created

  • System.Reflection.CustomAttributeFormatException thrown on a retrieval of derived attribute with overridden property getter #110945
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • fix browser-wasm debug build #110943
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution

Updated

  • Fix alignment padding and add test for saving managed resources #110915
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Exit the lock before we call into user code and handle losing the race for the RCW table #110828
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Add lock in ValidateName #110780
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • [release/9.0-staging] Move ComWrappers AddRef to C/C++ #110815
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.x
  • Refactor use of `FastAllocateString` #110929
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Safer stackallocs #110864
    area-Meta
  • [JIT] [APX] Enable additional General Purpose Registers. #108799
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, apx, 10.0.0
